name: Kanri
title: kanriapp.com
shortDescription: Kanri is a modern Kanban board app designed for personal use, operating entirely offline. It's ideal for individuals seeking a simple, efficient tool to manage tasks without the need for internet connectivity. Users can enjoy features like customizable boards, columns, and cards, along with rich text formatting for detailed task descriptions. It's perfect for anyone from freelancers to project managers who prefer visual task management and need a reliable tool that ensures privacy and accessibility.
pros: Highly customizable with themes and keyboard shortcuts
cons: Limited to desktop platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux)
Lacks integration with other tools and services
